channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 23:37 Air anxiety in the Nikolaev area follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 23:37 Air anxiety in the Nikolaev area follow further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 23:31 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marhanetsky Territorial Community-March Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community
